chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
items.plainText: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:

items.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
items.plainText: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.

items.text: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
items.plainText: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.

items.text: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
items.plainText: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.

items.text: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
items.plainText: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.

items.text: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
items.plainText: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:

items.text: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
items.plainText: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.

items.text: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
items.plainText: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
